content.question: Samuelsonâ€™s study of Le Creusot is best explained by which of the following characteristics of the British Parliament at the time?

choices.label: Parliament offered financial rewards to inventors.
Parliament still contained many representatives of the landed aristocracy.
Parliament passed industrial reform acts to alleviate harsh working conditions.
Parliament represented commercial and industrial interests.

content.answer: Parliament represented commercial and industrial interests.

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
